data.title: Not Lost in Translation: Aragonese Court Culture on Tour (1400–1480)
data.meta_description: David Abulafia prompts us to avoid anachronism, to remind ourselves of the obvious; a historian’s “compartmentalization” of the past is not matched in the minds of those she seeks to examine.1
